content: प्रवेणिः --णी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} A braid of hair (in general); <ls>R. 15. 30.</ls> {@--2@} The hair twisted and unadorned (worn by wives in the absence of their husbands). {@--3@} The housings of an elephant. {@--4@} A piece of colour ed woollen cloth. {@--5@} The current or stream (of a river).
